meanings.definition: A type of medication that is formulated to release its active ingredients over an extended period of time.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed spansules to slowly release the medicine into his body.
meanings.sent2: She took her spansules every morning to manage her condition effectively.
meanings.sent3: The spansules danced around in the bottle, waiting to be taken.
meanings.sent4: The spansules were like tiny time capsules, releasing healing power throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: As the spansules dissolved, they unleashed their healing magic bit by bit.

meanings.definition: The brand name of a specific type of extended-release medication.
meanings.sent1: My pharmacist recommended spansules for my condition.
meanings.sent2: The spansules were more expensive than the regular medication.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed her collection of spansules on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The spansules were like little superheroes fighting the illness over time.
meanings.sent5: The spansules logo on the bottle reminded her of the power of slow release.
